Author: Anonymous
Comment: This may sound like a poor solution, but you really should get both. 770 is designed to work alongside with your phone, so it’s not a question of replacing it. You can stream content from your 4gb phone then. The browsing experience etc. from the 770 is unmatched, N9x by itself cannot really substitute it properly…

Author: Pip
Comment: In an ideal world I would have both, but there’s no way I could justify the expense (either to myself or my girlfriend ;), especially on a set of devices which would only have a lifespan of a couple of years tops.
